name: Barrel Blitz
description:
BARREL BLITZ!

Use only the spacebar and timing to progress through levels, a chill laid back game.

My first ever game made for the Mini Jam game jam:

Restrictions- Use only color palette provided https://lospec.com/palette-list/arcade-standard-29

Theme- Future, not represented in a standard way but I like to think there's a future where a cat ball like creature soars through the skies traveling by barrel.

I plan on releasing many more levels, however I ran out of time and had to stop at 3 due to time constraints.
